author: Mashable Video
title: Janelle Monáe set to provide music for 'Lady and the Tramp'
description: In addition to the character she's voicing.
content: Janelle Monáe will create new music for the upcoming live-action Disney remake of Lady and the Tramp. The singer and actress is already voicing the Pekingese dog named Peg in the reboot of the 1955 animated movie.
